name: QCen Juicer Machine, 500W Centrifugal Juicer Extractor with Wide Mouth 3‚Äù Feed Chute for Fruit Vegetable, Easy to Clean, Stainless Steel, BPA-free (Aqua)
about_this_item: Upgraded 500W Motor - Centrifugal juicer machine with upgraded 500W high speed motor, more efficient and powerful than cold press juicer maker, last much longer than other competitor. 3‚Äù wide mouth will save your time on cut everything into small sticks.

Dual Speed Juicer Machine - Juicer Machine with 2 speed control(12000-18000 RPM), "1" low speed for soft fruits and veg, such as watermelon, orange, strawberry etc. ‚Äú2‚Äù high speed for some hard fruits and veg, such as carrot, celery, apple, pear etc.
Centrifugal Juicer with Wide Mouth - Centrifugal juicers have a wide mouth to feed your fruits and veggies into, Save your time on chopping and cutting the fruits and vegetables before juicing.

Safety Design and Easy to Clean - Juicer Extractor with locking system arm, it will not work without cover locked into place. Overload protection system will switch off machine once overheating occurs. Detachable parts makes it easy to clean!
To remove filter basket, please grasp the edge of the filter basket and pull up. Notice: Avoid trying to juice things with a low water content.

title: Lo recomiendo
content: I bought this juicer about a month ago. I have used it numerous times to ensure that I write a knowledgeable review on this item. Aesthetically, the juicer is lovely. I have the one in the blue color and it is very pleasing to the eyes. However, this is my first juicer so I dont have a lot of experience with juicing but I feel there are a lot of parts to it and its discouraging for me to use because I have so much to clean and air dry but that's just me. As far as the juicing abilities is concerned. I believe it juices very quickly, which is a double edge sword.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: On one hand, quick juicing may be very convenient when you are on the go; however, so much of my juice is with the pulp that I still need to strain my pulp or just take the container with the pulp in it, turn it upside down and slowly pour the juice from that container into the container with the extracted juice. I know you get what you pay for and I didn't know about masticating juicers until after I purchased this one, but I still  believe for what you pay, you shouldn't have to extract juice from the pulp container, but that's just me. So what I do is, I strain the pulp to extract the rest if the juice and at times, I save my pulp, put it in the freezer and use it for either fruit and vegetable smoothies or slushes.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024

title: Good
content: Overall, this is a good beginner friendly juicer. Its pretty tonlook at and not complicated to use, but honestly, if you don't plan on spending more money in the future to buy a more proficient juicer (like a masticating juicer), save yourself the money, and put it all toward a masticating juicer. Otherwise, this one will do. I hope someone finds this to be helpful. Be blessed!
